label: 衛門府
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A Headquarters of the Guards (Efu) in charge of the outer gates of the Greater Imperial Palace (Daidairi). Later amalgamated with the Headquarters of the Palace Guards (Ejifu), which still later became the Headquarters of the Outer Palace Guards (Emonfu). Patrolled the grounds of the Greater Imperial Palace. [衛府、大内裏、衛士府]
